overview: This series introduces you to beautiful girls who know all the perfect moves. Featured cover girl Kazumi has had a streak of bad luck at the poker table, but she's luckier with men. When she's dealing, every guy wants to ante up for a shot at her honeypot. Jazlyn Ray, Riley Steele, Scarlett Jones, and Anissa Kate are all gliding into our lineup of delicate, desirable ladies.
title: Finesse
